Customers may experience slow response or 524 errors for Magic Transit API endpoints
This does not affect existing configuration.

We are currently investigaing the issue.

components.name: API
components.description: Application programming interface (API) for customers to read and write their configurations at https://api.cloudflare.com

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.
The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.
We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Cloudflare is investigating reports of elevated HTTP 503, 520, 522 errors

We are working to analyze and mitigate this problem.  More updates to follow shortly.
